rows.label: qst700706_msg0001
rows.name:
Aahh, sorry! I was trying
to signal you not to come.

rows.label: qst700706_msg0002
rows.name:
I was being chased by
monsters. I'm really sorry.

rows.label: qst700706_msg0003
rows.name:
But still, it's been a while!
I can't believe I'd be saved
by you guys again.

rows.label: qst700706_msg0004
rows.name:
Look, it's me! Kaym, the
one you helped with the
monster blocking the bridge!

rows.label: qst700706_msg0005
rows.name:
I had a feeling we'd meet
again, but haha, nice coincidences
tend to happen in pairs.

rows.label: qst700706_msg0006
rows.name:
...Shoot, I gotta hurry. Dad's
going to give me a beating!

rows.label: qst700706_msg0007
rows.name:
Sorry, I've got to run full speed!!
Thanks again for saving me!

rows.label: qst700706_msg0008
rows.name: See you back in the capital!!
